Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:屉

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+5C49

Main pronunciation 主要发音: ti (xiè)

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) a saddle pad 屟 , (later) drawer.

English senses 英语理解: drawer; tray; pad; screen

Usage example 用法举例: 抽屜 chōu tì (drawer)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 3258

Shuowen 说文解字:

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 屉 from 屜 from 屧 from 屟 saddle pad from person-squatting 尸 shī and (rem- 世 shì) from phonetic tree-leaves 枼 yè and road-left 彳 chì.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- 屜 originally a man 尸 who walks on the street 彳 枼) (- 屟 drawer possibly resemblance to shoe) (- 屜 drawer)

屧字的基本解释

屧
xiè
古代鞋的木底：“泌少贫，昼日斫屧，夜读书随月光。”
木底鞋：响屧廊。
泛指鞋：“画屧重高墙。”
行走：“又尝步屧白杨郊野间。”

屧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》蘇協切，入帖，心。］
亦作“屧1”。
(1)本指鞋中的衬垫，后即用指木屐。
(2)践踏；行走。

屧字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【尸字部】　屧； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页303第48
【唐韻】蘇叶切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】悉協切，?音燮。【說文】履中薦也。本作屟，从尸枼聲。【徐曰】履中替也。　又【增韻】屐也。【姑蘇圖經】吳王宮中有響屟廊，以楩梓板籍地。行則有聲，故名。【杜甫詩】步屟隨春風。　【集韻】或作??。

Basic explanation of words
Qi
xiè
The wooden soles of ancient shoes: "Should secrete the poor, squeeze me out day by day, read books at night follow the moonlight."
Clogs: Loud porch.
Refers to shoes in general: "The painting is heavy on the wall."
Walking: "Taste Buqi Baiyang Countryside."
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guang Yun" Su Xie cut, enter the post, heart. ]
Also known as "屟1".
(1) This refers to the padding in the shoes, and then refers to the clogs.
(2) Trample; walk.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 1] [Department of Corpse Characters] 　屟; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 303-48
[Tang Yun] Su Yeqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Xixieqie,? Yinxie. 【Said the text】Recommended to perform in the middle. This is the sound of the corpse. [Xu Yue] Li Zhong is also a substitute.　[Zeng Yun] Clogs also. 【Gusu Picture Scripture】There is a porch in the palace of the king of Wu, which is based on the hometown of Yanzi. The line is sound, hence the name. [Poems of Du Fu] Steps follow the spring breeze.　【Jiyun】or as ??.
